author: Special Correspondent
text:
The youth, who was accused of attempting to murder a schoolgirl on March 21, was found dead in a tank here on Wednesday morning. The police said that the highly decomposed body was noticed by cattle grazers.

Srivilliputtur Deputy Superintendent of Police R. Venugopal said that the family members identified the body to be that of R. Rajkumar (21).

Post-mortem was done at the site. It was found that the youth had also died on March 21. “We got information that the youth had consumed poison immediately after hacking the girl. But, we could not confirm it then,” the DSP said.

Special teams were on the lookout for the accused who hacked the Plus Two girl when she was returning home after appearing for the public exam. The girl, who was admitted to a private hospital, was discharged recently.

The viscera had been sent for forensic examination, the police said.
title: Youth, who attacked schoolgirl, found dead
